{{flag|Albania}} | first contested = | teams involved = [[Dinamo Tirana]], [[Partizani Tirana]] | most wins = [[Partizani Tirana]] (47) | most player appearances = | mostrecent = | nextmeeting = | total = | league = | series = | regularseason = | postseason = | largestvictory = [[Partizani Tirana]] 4-0 [[Dinamo Tirana]] }} The '''Communist Albanian derby''' is the name given to any [[association football|football]] match contested between [[Dinamo Tirana]] and [[Partizani Tirana]] football clubs.[http://www.fotbal.tv/matches/2008/03/05/albania/cup/ks-dinamo-tirana/kf-partizani-tirana/564811/head2head/ Results 1998-present] ==Win-loss totals== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !Competition !Played !Dinamo !Draw !Partizani !Dinamo
Goals !Partizani
Goals |- |'''Overall''' |133 |41 |45 |47 |144 |158 |- |} ==External links== *[http://www.fotbal.tv/matches/2008/03/05/albania/cup/ks-dinamo-tirana/kf-partizani-tirana/564811/head2head// Results of the derby, starting of 1998] ==See also== * [[Tirana derby I]] * [[Tirana derby II]] * [[All-time Albanian derby]] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Football in Albania]] {{Albania-sport-stub}} {{Footy-stub}}
